title: All The World's A Globe - S01 - Radio Comedy - MP3 - Slimoo
description:
All The World's A Globe - Series 01 - Audio Comedy - BBC7 via DVB-T
8 x 15 minute episodes - 128Kbps - Mp3 - Slimoo




Being the history of mankind from the first amoeba to the Second World War told in 8 parts. 

Presented by The (entire cast of) National Theatre Of Brent (Desmond Oliver Dingle and Wallace).

Winner of the 1991 Sony Award for Best Dramatisation.





Cast:
Patrick Barlow
Jim Broadbent
Peter Barker

Written by Patrick Barlow

Additional material by Jim Broadbent & Martin Duncan

Produced by Lissa Evans







All The World's A Globe - S01 - E01 - The Creation
All The World's A Globe - S01 - E02 - Ancient Egypt
All The World's A Globe - S01 - E03 - Greece And Rome
All The World's A Globe - S01 - E04 - The Norman Conquests
All The World's A Globe - S01 - E05 - St Francis Of Assissi
All The World's A Globe - S01 - E06 - The Civil War
All The World's A Globe - S01 - E07 - The Battle Of Trafalgar Square And The Emaciation Of Women
All The World's A Globe - S01 - E08 - The 20th Century
